widgets.name: weather
widgets.description: Display the country, temperature and weather for a city

widgets.name: tops
widgets.description: Display the user's 'n' best artists or songs ('n' corresponds to the number parameter)

widgets.name: likes
widgets.description: Display the user's last 'n' likes ('n' corresponds to the number parameter)

widgets.name: subscribed
widgets.description: Display the 'n' last user subscriptions ('n' corresponds to the number parameter)

widgets.name: favorites
widgets.description: Display the last 10 tweet favorited by the user

widgets.name: retweets
widgets.description: Display the last 10 tweets retweeted by the user

widgets.name: tweet
widgets.description: Tweet from the widget on the users twitter account
